Thulsa's personal guards in the Ebon Tower are the Blood Legion, given immortality through Thulsa's necromancy.

Their life force is constantly renewed through their eternal hearts, which serve as vessels of their souls.

Destroy the Blood Legion and bring me their hearts. Without those hearts, Thulsa can't bring them back.
Well done, <PCNAME>. We'll either find a way to destroy them, or they can spend their eternal lives imprisoned.
Make sure you bring back the eternal heart of every Blood Legion soldier you kill. Otherwise, Thulsa can give them new bodies.
